__e: You see, there are some... very bad creatures out there that want nothing more but to destroy this planet and everything that you hold dear.
- It's not your fault. I felt guilty so I went over there, and there were these.... I don't know, creatures.
For me there's no bigger challenge and there's no greater reward than capturing images in the ocean.
Evil. There are over 2,000 of those creatures on board. We could never kill them one by one like this.
Your medical computers have information on every procedure in the Federation's hospitals.
The fault lies with all of us.
They are Earth creatures and dangerous to us!
I do not trust these Earth creatures.
and let the creatures of the night eat you to death while I watch.
We-- we are God's creatures, just like you.
I mean, I know they're God's creatures, but...
They don't just want our town, they want what makes us God's creatures.
and let the creatures of the night eat you to death while I watch.
They don't just want our town, they want what makes us God's creatures.
I mean, I know they're God's creatures, but...
These things are God's gifts first before the King's possessions.
Ghouls are on the counterband list for a reason.
Like I told you, the creatures are small.

Then they gotta see something with their own eyes that proves it. Maybe they see me pull one of these things out of their son, body twitching and flapping in ways the human body ought not to do. Or they see their mama look back at them with those dead, black eyes.
- We all's the Lord's creatures, right?
I believe that's the sweetest thing God ever put on this earth.
It's only free because we've enslaved the poor creatures and they work for nothing.
I must not be so near a creature of the outdoor woods.
They are some kind of creature, things from another planet.
